import {React, useState} from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import Select from 'react-select'; import { Modal } from 'react-responsive-modal'; const options = [ { value: 'chocolate', label: 'Chocolate' }, { value: 'strawberry', label: 'Strawberry' }, { value: 'vanilla', label: 'Vanilla' }, ]; export default function CreateChallenges(props){ const { register, handleSubmit, reset, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState(null); const onSubmit = (data,e) => { console.log(data) } return(
CREATE CHALLENGE
{errors.title &&
Title is Required
}
{errors.descripiton &&
Description is Required
}
{errors.tags &&
Tags is Required
}
) }
